trans-unit.source: Provides core services of the Microsoft Annotations Framework to manage and display user annotations.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os serviços principais do Microsoft Annotations Framework para gerenciar e exibir anotações do usuário.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e iniciar um <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para uso com um controle de exibição de documento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> can be used with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> pode ser usado com controles de exibição de documento a seguir:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclasses derivadas

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The document reading control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle de leitura de documento associado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para uso com um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle de exibição de documento associado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para uso com um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O controle de exibição de documento associado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> class for use with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para uso com um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DocumentViewer" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentPageViewer" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be used with <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived controls:
trans-unit.target: Este construtor pode ser usado com <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> controles derivados:

trans-unit.source: The following example shows use of the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra o uso do <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to clear highlight annotations from the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para limpar anotações de destaque da seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir comandos roteados para itens de menu em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a highlight annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para criar uma anotação de destaque na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir comandos roteados para itens de menu em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create an ink-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para criar uma anotação de nota à tinta na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra os comandos como são atribuídas aos itens de menu em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to create a text-note annotation on the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para criar uma anotação de nota de texto na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra os comandos como são atribuídas aos itens de menu em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note, text-note, and highlight annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para excluir todas as anotações de nota à tinta, nota de texto e realce na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to assign routed commands to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como atribuir comandos roteados para itens de menu em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Represents the command to delete all ink-note and text-note annotations in the current selection.
trans-unit.target: Representa o comando para excluir todas as anotações de nota à tinta e nota de texto na seleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how routed commands are assigned to menu items in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra os comandos como são atribuídas aos itens de menu em [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_titlexaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-titlexaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Disables annotations processing and hides all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Desabilita o processamento de anotações e oculta todas as anotações visíveis.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> is called all annotations become hidden.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> é chamado de todas as anotações ficam ocultas.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> method when you stop the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Disable%2A> método quando você interrompe o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: The annotation store to use for reading, writing, and displaying annotations.
trans-unit.target: O repositório de anotação a ser usado para ler, gravar e exibir anotações.

trans-unit.source: Enables the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> for use with a given <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> and displays all visible annotations.
trans-unit.target: Habilita o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> para uso com um determinado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> e exibe todas as anotações visíveis.

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> is called all annotations in the viewer control window are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Quando <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> é chamado de todas as anotações na janela de controle do visualizador são exibidas.

trans-unit.source: (The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.)
trans-unit.target: (O controle do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação é especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.)

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method when you start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> método quando você inicia um <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="annotationStore" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="annotationStore" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associado a um controle de exibição de documento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método pode ser usado para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associado com o seguinte documento controles de exibição:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclasses derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O controle do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação é especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: The document reader control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
trans-unit.target: O controle do leitor de documento para o qual retornar a instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document reader control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified document reader has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associado ao controle do leitor de documento fornecido; ou <see langword="null" />, se o leitor de documento especificado não tiver nenhum <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método pode ser usado para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associado com o seguinte documento controles de exibição:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclasses derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O controle do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação é especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="reader" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="reader" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The document viewer control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
trans-unit.target: O controle do visualizador de documento para o qual retornar a instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associado a um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.FlowDocumentScrollViewer" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document viewer control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified viewer control has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associado ao controle do visualizador de documento fornecido; ou <see langword="null" />, se o controle do visualizador especificado não tiver nenhum <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método pode ser usado para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associado com o seguinte documento controles de exibição:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclasses derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O controle do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação é especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The document viewing control to return the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance for.
trans-unit.target: O controle de exibição de documento para o qual retornar a instância <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> instance associated with a specified document viewing control.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associada a um controle de exibição de documento especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associated with the given document viewing control; or <see langword="null" /> if the specified document viewing control has no <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> associado ao controle de exibição de documento determinado; ou <see langword="null" />, se o controle de exibição de documento especificado não tiver nenhum <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> method can be used to return the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associated with the following document viewing controls:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.GetService%2A> método pode ser usado para retornar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> associado com o seguinte documento controles de exibição:

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> derived subclasses
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DocumentViewerBase> subclasses derivadas

trans-unit.source: The viewer control associated with the annotation service is specified in the parameter to the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O controle do visualizador associado ao serviço de anotação é especificado no parâmetro para o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="viewer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="viewer" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> is enabled.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> está habilitado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" /> estiver habilitado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.IsEnabled%2A> property when you create and start an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.IsEnabled%2A> propriedade quando você cria e iniciar um <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.

trans-unit.source: Also if the user chooses to open a new document in the viewer control, the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> must be disabled for the old document and then enabled for the new document.
trans-unit.target: Também se o usuário optar por abrir um novo documento no controle do visualizador, o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> deve ser desabilitado para o documento antigo e, em seguida, habilitada para o novo documento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> usado por este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> used by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore" /> usado por este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> used by the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> is specified as a parameter in the service's <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.Storage.AnnotationStore> usado pelo <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService> é especificado como um parâmetro no serviço de <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Enable%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use the <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Store%2A> property when you start and stop an <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como usar o <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService.Store%2A> propriedade quando você iniciar e parar um <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.AnnotationService>.
